result.eng: Is Irish difficult, in your opinion?

result.eng: Do you have any opinion on the matter?

result.eng: What is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?

result.ponchtml: Cad é réiteaċ na faiḋbe dar leatWhat is the solution to the problem, in your opinion?

result.html: Cad é do bharúil féinWhat is your opinion?

result.eng: Is Irish difficult, in your opinion?
result.ga: An bhfuil an Ghaeilge deacair dar leat

result.eng: The TV presenters were of the same opinion.
result.ga: Bhí na láithreoirí teilifíse den tuairim chéanna
result.orig: Bhí na láithreoirí teilifíse den tuairim chéanna

result.ponchtml: Ḃí na láiṫreoirí teilifíse den tuairim ċéannaThe TV presenters were of the same opinion.

result.eng: He had a high opinion of him.
